name: Don't Eat Me
description:
In this Isometric Adventure game, you’ll meet a little Onion who gets her world turned upside-down when she learns that vegetables are raised... to be eaten! To escape this fate, you must navigate through a malefic garden patch, towards the family’s truck; and work to stowaway as many Veggies as you can by dawn. But work fast, because there's a chance you might lose your friends, some enemies, or even your roots along the way.

Feel free to download and play the Early Development Stage of our game and provide feedback via our Playtest Feedback Form below!

Game Specs:

Version #: v0.1.0

Average Playtime: 5 minutes

Available On: Windows

Equipment Needed: Keyboard and Mouse/Trackpad

https://forms.gle/XhPGmsRp2KM9WmF38
